value.title: Canvas 绘制路径
value.content:
## 绘制路径常用API

### 开始绘制路径
ctx.beginPath()

### 结束当前路径
ctx.closePath()

### 移动到某个位置
ctx.moveTo(x: number, y: number)

### 连接到某个位置
ctx.lineTo(x: number, y: number)

### 绘制圆弧
ctx.arcTo(x: number, y: number, r: number, x2: number, y2: number)

### 填充路径
ctx.fill()

### 描边路径
ctx.stroke()

## 其他
### 路径剪切
ctx.clip()

### 一次贝塞尔曲线
ctx.quadraticCurveTo(ctrlPointX: number, ctrlPointY: number, x2: number, y2: number)

### 二次贝塞尔曲线
ctx.besierCurveTo(ctrlPointX1: number, ctrlPointY1: number, ctrlPointX2: number, ctrlPointY2: number, x2: number, y2: number)
